verses.roman:
nārada kahe,--'eka-vastu māgi tomāra sthāne'
vyādha kahe,--"mṛgādi laha, yei tomāra mane

synonyms: nārada kahe—Nārada Muni said; eka-vastu māgi—I wish to beg one thing; tomāra sthāne—from you; vyādha kahe—the hunter replied; mṛga-ādi laha—take some of the hunted animals; yei tomāra mane—whatever you like.
translation: "Nārada Muni then told the hunter, 'I have one thing to beg of you.' The hunter replied, 'You may take whatever animals or anything else you would like.
